titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the exclusion of gain on sale of a principal residence shall apply to certain farmland sold with the principal residence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the exclusion of gain on the sale of a principal residence to qualified farmland sold with the residence.
